name: Mychess II
overview: Novice through championship play plus stunning 3-D graphics. Imagine playing chess with your computer in breathtaking 3-D! Why settle for a flat 2-D display when you can be playing championship chess in beautiful 3-D? Mychess II lets you choose whether you want to play in 2-D, 3-D, color or black and white. But that's just for openers! Mychess II also highlights all potential legal moves. Shows whether a given square is covered by an opponent's piece. Replays entire game at eight different speeds. Allows you to play the computer, another person or let the computer play itself. Searches for mate within a given number of moves. Recommends best moves and retracts worst moves. Set up and rotates the board any way you like. Saves games to disk. Prints them out. And- Mychess II can be the toughest opponent you'll ever play- with nine levels, from novice to master. As a special bonus, 128 great games of chess are included on the disk, so you can learn from the masters! Complete with full documentation, including chess history, chess notation and a summary of the official rules of chess, courtesy of the US Chess Federation, Mychess II is the ultimate computer chess game.
